channel.title: Windsor on Ontario Universities & Colleges Coalition
channel.description: Recent content in Windsor on Ontario Universities & Colleges Coalition

item.title: University of Windsor Walkout: March 20th at Noon
item.description: Join students from across the province in a walk out on Wednesday March 20 at 12 pm to demonstrate to the Ontario government that we will not tolerate their cuts to our education. We will be having a number of speakers attend this from all across the city. Join us at the CAW Centre Courtyard for the Province-Wide Student Walk out Wednesday, March 20 12pm-2pm 401 Sunset Ave. Got any questions, concerns or want us to make a class announcement?
